turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a coffee from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I would be happy to help do you have a preference of coffee shop

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes the closest Strabucks please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, there is a Starbucks 8 minutes away,4th Street in Colorado Springs. would this work?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I have your Starbucks account loaded with money would you like to use this account and funds?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like me to order you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Venti Pikes Place with 2 pumps of simple syrup please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok would you like me to put the order in for as soon as possible

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please I am in a rush.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok would you like to add anything else to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just the coffee please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wait, can you make that 3 pumps of simple syrup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course I will change the coffee to 3 pumps

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me confirm, you would like a venti pikes place with 3 pumps of simple syrup from Starbucks using your loaded account

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great anything else I can assist with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, have a great day
